archiefmat.rf_archive: Koninklijke Bibliotheek - Den Haag, Bijzondere Collecties
archiefmat.titel: Verzameling van stukken betrekking hebbende op Nederlands West-Indie, bijeengebracht resp. geschreven door J.H.J. Hamelberg, ambtenaar te Curacao
archiefmat.titel_eng: Collection of documents concerning the Netherlands West Indies, brought together and written by J.H.J. Hamelberg, civil servant on Curacao
archiefmat.scope: The emphasis is on Curaςao and St. Eustatius, 18th century.
archiefmat.notes:
17th - 19th centuries and undated records. The emphasis is on Curaςao and St Eustatius, 18th century.

A detailed description of the collection was published in: Verslag der Koninklijke Bibliotheek over 1919, pp. XXXVI-XLIII.
